audioText: Je ne manquerai jamais une occasion digne de mon attention professionnelle.
question: What won't the speaker miss?
explanation: The text states 'Je ne manquerai jamais une occasion digne de mon attention professionnelle' - I will never miss an opportunity worthy of my professional attention. The verb 'manquerai' is the future of 'manquer' (to miss), and 'digne' means worthy.
